TypeSignature.Value: public abstract class BaseDataEnvironment : IDisposable, msdatasrc.DataSource
.class public auto ansi abstract BaseDataEnvironment extends System.Object implements class msdatasrc.DataSource, class System.IDisposable
Public MustInherit Class BaseDataEnvironment Implements DataSource, IDisposable
public ref class BaseDataEnvironment abstract : IDisposable, msdatasrc::DataSource
type BaseDataEnvironment = class interface DataSource interface IDisposable

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.* classes are obsolete and supported within 32 bit processes only. http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=160862")

summary.span: 在已从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级的应用程序中模拟 Visual Basic 6.0 。

span.span: Emulates a Visual Basic 6.0 in applications that have been upgraded from Visual Basic 6.0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 Visual Basic 6.0 中，数据绑定窗体时自动创建拖动中的数据库元素`Data Environment`拖到窗体。In Visual Basic 6.0, data-bound forms were automatically created when you dragged database elements from a `Data Environment` onto a form. `Data Environment`处理 Visual Basic 6.0 和 ADO 数据层之间的所有映射。The `Data Environment` handled all the mapping between Visual Basic 6.0 and the ADO data layer. 如果应用程序升级到 Visual Basic`BaseDataEnvironment`创建以启用与 ADO 相关的代码。When an application is upgraded to Visual Basic, a `BaseDataEnvironment` is created to enable the ADO-related code. [!INCLUDE[Note_compatibility](~/includes/note-compatibility-md.md)]

summary.span: 释放由 占用的非托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources that are used by a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法由公共`Dispose()`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. [!INCLUDE[Note_compatibility](~/includes/note-compatibility-md.md)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familynewslot virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)
abstract member Dispose : bool -> unit override this.Dispose : bool -> unit

param.name: disposing
param.span: 表示释放托管资源和非托管资源； 表示仅释放非托管资源。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 释放由 使用的非托管资源，也可以释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources that are used by a , and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法由公共`Dispose()`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`方法释放参数设置为`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the disposing parameter set to `true`. 调用`Dispose`释放参数设置为`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with the disposing parameter set to `false`. 当处置参数为`true`，此方法释放此控件引用任何托管对象所持有的所有资源。When the disposing parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this control references. 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object. [!INCLUDE[Note_compatibility](~/includes/note-compatibility-md.md)]
